Find the characteristic polynomial of the matrix A =

det(	1	2
        3	4
	-	 
	    ?? 	0
        0	??

    ) 

=  (1- ?? )* (4 - ??) - 3 * 2 = 0
=  (1- ?? )* (4 - ??) - 6= 0
= ??^2 +4+4 ??- ??-6 = 0
= ??^2 -3 ??-2 = 0


Polynomial equation = ??^2 -3 ??-2 = 0
